items.sentence: I think you should know that I can't go with you tomorrow.
I know that it's highly unlikely that anybody can help me.
I know that the last thing that you want to do is help me.
I know that the last thing that you want to do is hurt me.
Can you see that house over there? That's where Tom lives.
We don't have room in our apartment for a washing machine.
Tom gave Mary a novelty pencil sharpener for her birthday.
For breakfast, Tom had bacon and eggs and a cup of coffee.
I lived in Boston for several years when I was a teenager.
I hear you've been walking around town with no clothes on.
The reason Tom does that for Mary is because he loves her.
It won't be easy to find a time that works for both of us.
Tom wanted to be able to play the ukulele as well as Mary.
We saw a man with a dog standing near the telephone booth.
I wonder why your dog didn't bark when I came to the door.
Tom didn't give me everything that he promised to give me.
I thought that we'd agreed not to talk about that anymore.
I don't suppose it's possible to read a book by moonlight.
I don't want to be intrusive, but is everything all right?
Mr. Jackson is the teacher who gives us the most homework.
Tom and Mary both have to stay in Australia until October.
I hope Tom isn't going to be the one who does the driving.
There are three students with the same name in that class.
I think Mary will be offended by what Tom is going to say.
Smoking in a car with a child under 16 is against the law.
Which shirt do you like more, the red one or the blue one?
Tom was the one who told me that I didn't have to do that.
I didn't wait for Tom and went to look for Mary by myself.
I think my French pronunciation is much better than Tom's.
French was the only language I spoke until I was thirteen.
I'd like to practice speaking French with native speakers.
The coroner couldn't say for sure what caused Tom's death.
Let's wait until Tom gets here before we open the package.
I'll expect you tomorrow unless you let me know otherwise.
I'll explain the reason in the fifth chapter of this book.
I'll overlook it this time, but don't let it happen again.
Mary is the only woman I've ever really been in love with.
Without your encouragement, I would've given up this plan.
The distrust between Tom and Mary almost led to a divorce.
The man I met in the park yesterday said his name was Tom.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary thinks he's stupid.
I told them that they could do whatever they wanted to do.
We need to stay after school and help clean the classroom.
Tom isn't like his father. He's much more like his mother.
Tom needs to start thinking about what's best for himself.
Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work.
All you have to do is to write your name and address here.
Someone suggested that it would be a good idea to do that.
If you take the express train, you'll be there in no time.
Tom called to say that he'd be more than three hours late.
